grass.desc: Every time a grass type pokémon attacks, the entire team heals 50 HP

poison.desc: Every time a poison type pokémon attacks, there is a 20% chance of decreasing enemy defense by 50

fire.desc: Fire type pokémon have a chance to increase their attack by 20. 1 = 10%, 2 = 20%

fighting.desc: Fighting type pokémon's abilities can critical strike and deal double damage

steel.desc: Increases the defense of the entire team. 2 = +20, 3 = +50

water.desc: Water type pokémon can decrease enemy attack. 2 = -30

fairy.desc: All fairy pokémon deal true damage

ghost.desc: Ghost pokémon are immune to normal and fighting type moves

dragon.desc: Dragon pokémon increases the maximum HP of the team. 2 = +100, 3 = +200

normal.desc: Normal type pokémons' abilities use no action point
